Package deusto.safebox.server.dao.sql

Class SqlDaoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • deusto.safebox.server.dao.sql.SqlDaoManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DaoManager, AutoCloseable
    public class SqlDaoManager
extends Object
implements DaoManager, AutoCloseable
    Implementation of DaoManager for SQL databases.
